manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Team Up. Fight On. AORUS, a premium gaming brand powered by GIGABYTE, delivers a full spectrum of gaming products ranging from gaming laptops, motherboards, graphics cards, mechanical gaming keyboards, to many other gaming hardware and gears, offering the most extreme gaming experiences for enthusiasts worldwide! B450M DS3H Supports AMD 1st & 2nd Generation Ryzen/ Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors Dual Channel Non-ECC Unbuffered DDR4, 4 DIMMs HDMI, DVI-D Ports for Multiple Display PCIe Gen3 M.2 NVMe High Quality Audio Capacitors and Audio Noise Guard RGB Fusion supports RGB LED Strips in 7-Colors •Realtek Gigabit LAN •Smart Fan 5 with FAN STOP

Motherboard Features GIGABYTE Quality GIGABYTE's 400 series motherboards perfectly fit the latest AMD Ryzen 2000 series processors' computing performance with more features and more control. Maximize your PC's potential with AMD StoreMI technology, which accelerates traditional storage devices to reduce boot times and enhance the overall user experience. Stay Connected With 6 USB 3.1 ports and 8 USB 2.0 ports, you do not have to sacrifice connectivity with a smaller form factor. Get a plethora of options for your setup with numerous internal headers and back panel headers. Micro ATX Form Factor The micro-ATX form factor (9.6 inches x 8.4 inches) is a solid middle ground for DIY PC building. Suitable for compact builds, this form factor gives you more flexibility around your case.

GIGABYTE Features RGB Fusion Support Personalize your next PC rig to your liking by selecting the color of your choice to illuminate the external RGB light strip. A total of 7 colors are available to make your system appearance unique! Smart Fan 5 With Smart Fan 5 users can ensure that their gaming PC can maintain its performance while staying cool. Smart Fan 5 allows users to interchange their fan headers to reflect different thermal sensors at different locations on the motherboard. Multiple Display Outputs The onboard DVI-D port supports a maximum resolution of 1920 x 1200 at 60Hz while the onboard HDMI port supports a resolution of 4096 x 2160 at 60Hz. Ultra Durable GIGABYTE motherboards are built with Ultra Durable components such as anti-sulfur transistors, solid plated power connectors, and humidity protection glass fabric that give users peace of mind on the longevity of their system.

B450 AORUS PRO WIFI B450 AORUS Elite B450 AORUS M B450M DS3H B450 I AORUS PRO WIFI CPU Support AMD 1st & 2nd Gen Ryzen Processors / Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors AMD 1st & 2nd Gen Ryzen Processors / Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors AMD 1st & 2nd Gen Ryzen Processors / Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors AMD 1st & 2nd Gen Ryzen Processors / Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors AMD 1st & 2nd Gen Ryzen Processors / Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics Processors Memory Type Dual-Channel DDR4 Dual-Channel DDR4 Dual-Channel DDR4 Dual-Channel DDR4 Dual-Channel DDR4 Memory DIMMs 4*DDR4 4*DDR4 4*DDR4 4*DDR4 2*DDR4 Graphic Interface 1*PCIe 3.0 x16 1*PCIe 3.0 x16 1*PCIe 3.0 x16 1*PCIe 3.0 x16 1*PCIe 3.0 x16 Expansion Slots 1*PCIe 2.0 x4 / 2*PCIe 2.0 x1 1*PCIe 2.0 x4 / 2*PCIe 2.0 x1 1*PCIe 2.0 x4 + 1*PCIe 2.0 x1 1*PCIe 2.0 x4 + 1*PCIe 2.0 x1 N/A M.2 Slot 2 (M.2 Heatsink *2) 2 (M.2 Heatsink *1) 2 (M.2 Heatsink *1) 1 (M.2) 1 (M.2 Heatsink *1) Display Interface HDMI, DVI-D HDMI, DVI-D HDMI, DVI-D HDMI, DVI-D DisplayPort, HDMI*2 WIFI Intel Dual Band 802.11ac WIFI N/A N/A N/A Intel Dual Band 802.11ac Wave2 WIFI Audio ALC1220-VB 8-Channel HD 8-Channel HD 8-Channel HD Realtek ALC1220-VB Form Factor (mm) ATX (305x244) ATX (305x244) mATX (244x244) mATX (244x215) Mini-ITX (170x170)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for inexpensive gaming build or home office PC.
reviews.reviewText: The only thing some users might not like it the position of one of four SATA ports. If you plug SATA cable that is not on 90 angle, it would be impossible to install full length graphics card. The board allows for overclocking, but it does not make it easy by providing +/- values listed. Instead user has to enter new values. It requires knowledge of voltages and frequencies to set up overclocking correctly. Provided by Gigabyte SIV software allows for easier overclocking and setting XMP for RAM. Unfortunately SIV does not display RAM (DDR4) speed correctly while displaying it's status. I think it's a Windows 10 issue. Thankfully, DVD disc provided with the motherboard has a CPU-Z that correctly displays RAM speed, so there is a way to verify that settings are applied correctly. I have used this mobo to build a home office PC with Athlon 3000G and it's build in Vega 3. It allowed me to reliably overclock APU to 4.025 GHz with core voltage of 1.4V. I'm using SATA SSD, so I have not tried NVMe functionality on this board. AMD claims that Ryzen is required for NVMe to actually work as a system drive, but there are reviews of systems with Athlon 3000G working fine with NVMe as a boot/system drive. It worked with Athlon 3000G out of the box without any firmware update, so it is Ryzen 3000 ready (3000G requires the same mobo firmware as ZEN 2 Ryzen processors). The board is not flimsy and seems to be well build. The built-in RGB lighting on thy mobo is basically an orange light that can be turned on or of. That's it. There is however an RGB header for other components. The one shortcoming is that there are only two fan headers, one for CPU and the other for the case, so in some builds it means that additional splitters controllers are required, or fans will have to work at constant speed being not controlled by motherboard. For the price it is still a very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST motherboard at this price, but.. get the wifi version if you need wifi.
reviews.reviewText: If you are interested in wifi, and bluetooth as a bonus, I would easily recommend getting the B450M DS3H WIFI (rev. 1.0) on amazon over this product at this time for $20 more. Otherwise it is possible to fit a wifi on the lower PCIe x 4, but it is very cramped, reduces GPU airflow, and I've even noticed that it occasionally shuts the wifi down when the heat gets too intense from my stress tests.Like other reviews have noted, if you install a GPU the PCIe x1 slot below it along with the CMOS battery are completely covered. Also don't plan on putting a second GPU in this motherboard. It is impossible to install another GPU without covering the USB2, 1, COM, and TPM inputs, and in my DIYPC mini case a second GPU wouldn't fit due to cramping with the PSU, so you would need at least a mid tower to accomplish that.There is only 1 system fan PWM connection?!? So yes, I had to get a couple of fan splitters to remedy this for my 4 fan set up.Besides those issues, it is a truly wonderful, budget motherboard, but get the wifi version.PS you will still need a fan splitter with the wifi version so ya :p

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've used this motherboard in two budget boards for both my 18 year old son's gaming rig (Video) and 13 year old daughter's homework and gaming rig (pictured).Both builds were super easy except for my daughter's build...when I went to install Windows 7, it got to the beginning where you click to install windows, both mouse and keyboard turned off. This did not happen in my son's build which I did first. Could not figure out why. I ended up going straight to Windows 10 install and it worked fine.Anyway, both systems are up and running and run the games they play flawlessly. He plays GTA V and League of Legends and she plays Fortnite and some other random games. They both play Overwatch together.Son'sAMD Ryzen 5 1600 (AF)B450M DS3H16gb OLOy Warhawk RGB 3200 ramEnermax Aquafusion 120mm AIOEnermax SquA RGB Fans 2x120mmSamsung 512gb m.2Thermaltake Smart 600w psEVGA GTX 780 TIDIYPC S2-W-RGB White ATX Mid TowerDaughter'sAMD Ryzen 3 1200B450M DS3H16gb OLOy Warhawk RGB 3200 ramASUS GeForce GTX 1650 4GB Phoenix Fan OC EditionSamsung 512gb SSDThermaltake 750w PSdarkFlash DLM22 Mint Green Micro ATX case

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mother board, bear to install with Ryzen 5 5600G
reviews.reviewText: I was lucky to have the necessary parts in my spares to facilitate getting this going.Right out of the gate, I needed to boot with an Athlon 3000g to be able to update to the latest BIOS to support new Ryzen 5 5600G. Happy to day, once updated, worked fine. Also had to use an PCIe graphics board's VGA port to be able to set up the BIOS configuration, my monitor just would not sync on HDMI at boot time. This may be a failing on my monitor, but it is a common issue I believe.Decided to run an early beta version of Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, and that has worked out great with the on board, Radeon graphics driver, all except dual monitors...An attractive, low cost, blistering fast Linux box, with 32GB main RAM. It runs several instance of various OS's in Oracle virtual box no sweat, and was easy on the wallet.Easy to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile and Reliable Ryzen Motherboard
reviews.reviewText: The GIGABYTE B450M DS3H is an outstanding Micro ATX motherboard that seamlessly caters to AMD Ryzen AM4 processors, offering a reliable foundation for a wide range of computing needs. As a user, I have found this motherboard to be an exceptional choice for building a high-performance system without breaking the bank.One of the key highlights of the GIGABYTE B450M DS3H is its exceptional compatibility with AMD Ryzen processors. Whether you have a 1st, 2nd, or 3rd generation Ryzen CPU, this motherboard is more than ready to handle the task. Its versatility allows you to select the perfect Ryzen processor to suit your performance requirements and budget constraints.
Excelente placa com ótimo custo beneficio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is a great board. It works well, its well specified, easy to install and it has been utterly reliable in service. I bought this at same time as another make of board and have been so impressed by this one and disappointed with the other make, that I have now bought another gigabyte to replace the other board.These boards do what they say on the tin. They may not be the best if you want fancy gaming facilities and bells and whistles, but if you want a solid and reliable board to build a high spec desktop or server, this does very well indeed. I have now used this board in small office fileserver and in a dedicated Video production workstation. In both applications it has proved 100% reliable

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena placa, calidad decente a muy buen precio para montarse un PC de gama de entrada a media-alta.
reviews.reviewText: Buena placa, calidad decente a muy buen precio para montarse un PC de gama de entrada a gama media-alta.Tras mi primer mes de uso he comprobado cuales son las virtudes y defectos de la B450M DS3H.- La construcción y los detalles denotan buena calidad para un precio tan ajustado, tiene suporte RGB de 4-pines/12V, 4 puertos SATA III, además de refuerzo metálico en el puerto PCIe x16 para gráficas más pesadas.- Las fases de alimentación VRM, que tiene 4+3 fases, normal para un modelo de estas caracteristicas, pero algo limitante a la hora de jugar con los voltajes y realizar overclock, aunque honestamente las temperaturas del VRM son muy buenas con el Precision Boost Overdrive activado.- La BIOS viene por defecto desactualizada de fabrica, por lo que si quieres poner un procesador Ryzen 3000 es necesario tener un procesador Ryzen de generaciones anteriores (1000 o 2000) para poder actualizarla desde la BIOS.- Una vez actualizada la BIOS se convierte en una buena ventaja, a pocos dias de la salida del micro codigo AGESA 1.0.0.4 que trae mejoras sustanciales en cuanto tiempos de arranque y optimización de los Ryzen 3000.- Un contra que he encontrado es que al instalar una tarjeta gráfica de 2 o 3 ventiladores 2-3 de los 4 puertos SATA III quedan tapados por la gráfica y no permiten conectar un cable SATA normal, en mi caso lo he solventado usando usando cables SATA de perfil bajo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great with a gpu and 2 drives.
reviews.reviewText: This board works great with my systems and I’ve had no problems. I did my first build and had some concerns reading the negative reviews. Don’t listen to them. This is a great mobo and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a budget mobo!
